thread.title: Los Angeles Dodgers-New York Mets in NLDS Game 3: Start time, what TV channel, how to watch live stream online
thread.title_full: Los Angeles Dodgers-New York Mets in NLDS Game 3: Start time, what TV channel, how to watch live stream online | OregonLive.com

author: JD Humburg | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Los Angeles Dodgers-New York Mets in NLDS Game 3: Start time, what TV channel, how to watch live stream online
text:
The Los Angeles Dodgers and New York Mets resume their best-of-five National League Division Series with Monday's Game 3 in New York. Here are the details:
What : Los Angeles Dodgers at New York Mets in NLDS Game 3. The series is tied 1-1.
Where : Citi Field, New York
When : Monday, October 12, at 5:37 p.m. PT/8:37 p.m. ET
What TV channel : TV on TBS, radio on KMTT (910 AM) in Portland area
Online live stream : Watch online at WatchTBS or listen at ESPNRadio.com
Pitching matchup : Los Angeles' Brett Anderson vs. New York's Matt Harvey
Playoff schedule : Bookmark our MLB scoreboard for postseason scores and schedules.
